text: The curb-side pick-up was a complete fail.   Despite me pressing the "I'm here" button on my order page two separate times 10 mins apart and getting an automated acknowledgement, they never brought it out.     They said about 20 mins and I …More

name: Carrie Luedtke
text: Had this when I was in crestview Florida and it was awful. Crust tasted like really dry card board.

name: Jason Davis
text: Worst location in the county. The chain itself is great however this location will leave you feeling ripped off. It took 3 bad experiences over the course of two months for me to break and leave this review. I used to like to order from …More

name: Kimberly Kimbril
text: I am so appreciative of Hungry Howies.  It’s a quality pizza with amazing variety and taste.  My favorite is their large pepperoni, banana pepper with garlic butter herb crust. …More

name: caroline cunningham
text: Went in the other day food took wayyy longer than expected even though I ordered prior to showing up 20 minutes later. Place didn't look like it'd been cleaned in a hot minute. The worst though was the attitude from a girl wearing shorts that practically showed her butt. Not impressed and not wasting another minute on this place.

name: Megan Hunt
text: I've always loved hungry howies pizza. I never knew some, including this location, have a TACO PIZZA!! I highly recommend it. The workers are always nice, as I've always stopped in. The place appears clean and well maintained. I think its a nice touch that the veggie toppings come on the side.

name: Valerie Grant
text: I called in at 10:40 this morning to order 8 pizzas for my company. While I'm aware they don't open until 11, as a courtesy we have always called in early as a consideration to Hungry Howies so they have a head start. The gentleman who …More

name: Tim Phillips
text: After 40 minutes of waiting and watching every customer who ordered after me get their food I asked the cashier what was going on. 5 minutes later out came my pizza with a simple...”sorry we handed your food out to someone else and had to …More

name: terri dashney
text: Just had the cheesy stuffed crust bread! OMG! It is so awesome and the crew so nice and friendly!

name: Christie Dunn
text: This franchise supports their local schools’ sports teams. They’ve donated their great food to feed middle school players pregame meals. So much appreciated!!!

name: A. Hayes
text: A Niceville staple. You can't visit The Ville without having Hungry Howie's Pizza. Loads of flavored crust options, types of crusts, tons of topping options, desserts, wings, pizza 'subs', and soda options. I love their web page and how you …More

name: Fernando Stevens
text: pizza, so great. The food was super appetizing. Had a sister come into town and asked me to take her here again. Not so close to my office, unfortunately.

name: Kathaleena Valdez - Jackson
text: WOW was impressed! Not only was the pizza yummy but their service was great! He heard our grandson wanted pepperoni & we wanted meatlovers so he made our pizza with a few slices of pepperoni & even cut those slices into smaller slices just right for our grandson, very cool!!!

name: Connie Chartier
text: I have been a loyal customer for 15 years since the time I moved here and my husband was a customer for many years before that.. Food and service were always excellent 5 stars++ BUT two weeks go I ordered a pizza with everything on it just …More

name: Kierra Maiden
text: I love their pizza. It is sooo delicious!!!

name: Kelly Lewis
text: i normally like this place but i had a delivery february 2nd for 25.63 i tipped the guy 8.00 cash &signed the receipt. i have an emailed receipt from when i ordered which has the delivery charge on it as well...still 25.63. i was looking at …More

name: Kyle
text: Five stars for the awesome food, but the services were slow and a bit unorganized. Store itself could use a bit of a cleaning but over all it was good.

name: Skeleton Cove
text: Got one pepperoni and cheese pizza- it took an hour to get it. There we're alot of us waiting in the lobby and no one had any pizza. All of the customers looked upset. I'm very unhappy with this store

name: Mitchell Schuerenberg
text: If you want a GREAT pizza,  Hungry Howie's is the place to go!

name: Emily Clarrey
text: Wonderful Hungry Howies! My favorite take out pizza place in Niceville!

name: Richard Rosell
text: Love the flavored crust.  Pizza is always hot and is a good value.

name: Brian Bardisa
text: Sat for a quick dinner and the food and staff were great!

name: Gary Vincent
text: Always get a good pizza just the way I like it

name: Fred Ottey
text: Pizza and service are always great

name: Lance Jones
text: 3 delivery drivers and 2 hrs is all it took to get a Hungry Howie's pizza. After they FINALLY made the delivery, the manager called to tell us how none of it was their fault. They had no idea where Ernie's Dockside cafe is located - one of …More

name: Angel Rodriguez
text: Food there is sooo yummy! Great quality and always nice people

name: Stephanie Sheeler
text: Too bad I can't post a picture of these two failures passed off as pizza! Seriously considering a startup Pizza business....

name: Kelley Drummond
text: Our food came cold and the subs were terrible. There was no cheese or flavor in the cheese steak and the chicken parm was dry and tasteless. When I called the store to give my complaint they offered to send out new subs but who wants new …More

name: Darketty Glitz
text: Good hot and fresh

name: Jackie Roberts
text: Second review.....we ordered a pizza online and it was only 18.76. After I climb in bed and look at my charges pending, they charged me 22.57. So I called them and got the manager on the phone and he said he looked at the front register and …More

name: Matthew Reid
text: The last sub I ordered had very little flavor and the staff was kinda rude. Hopefully next time it's better.

name: Angel Pooler-Drummond
text: First they delivered the wrong pizza, then after waiting another 45 minutes the pizza they delivered was under cooked. We drove to the store where they actually argued with us about the quality . After waiting another 30 minutes we finally got our pizza . We asked to talk to a a manager and that never happened. Worst experience ever

name: Kyle Vincent
text: Pizza was delivered cold, obviously not made to order- Blatently obvious. In speaking with management over the phone,  thier attempt of resolition was to... hang up on us. My family and I will not be back to this establishment.

name: Traci K
text: Prices are good but was not impressed with the pizza or breadsticks at all.

name: Olli Copperwolf
text: I usually do Little Ceasers, but the birthday deal is supposed to be a large 1 topping pizza for 6.95 in my area. Whether it was a real deal or not for a birthday as a carryout, I don't know, but the guy at the counter was nice, and the …More

name: Darin Paddie
text: Usually fast and friendly staff. Just seems like the quality of food has decreased over the past few months.

name: Razor_Sharp001 XBOX PS4 PC
text: Love the large peperonie with cajun seasoned crust or the meat lovers with cajun seasoned crust. I most often prefer to order Hungry Howie's over it's competitors, Pizza Hut etc.

name: Virginia Dodge
text: Love the wacky Wednesday deal

name: Chris Davis
text: Read other reviews tried pizza n the wings.  Wings are ways better than pizza.  Go get a red Barron and then get their wings.

name: Miguel Jimenez
text: I order a pizza, the girl very attentive told be it would be done in about 10 minutes , I came back in 13 minutes . When I felt the box it was warm when it should been  hot  . I complaint and the manager told me that it was my fault for not …More

name: Katie L. Harris
text: Kind people and great food. What else could you ask for? Absolutely recommend this pizzeria above all others.

name: Coleen Gooding
text: I order a pizza from them and sent the wrong pizza first time and it was cold.  They took the pizza back and sent another cold one. Horrible service. Will not order from them

name: Judith Kennedy
text: They are the best, know my name, always a smile. Pizza is always hot and their specials are terrific

name: Steve Howald
text: Ham and cheese hot sub hard, cold and impossible to eat

name: Barry Wheelbarger
text: Pick it up yourself and they'll throw coupon prices at you regularly.  Large two-topping for $10.50?  I'm all over it.
